overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto has a strong presence across multiple social media platforms, with a total follower count of 3,580. Engagement is driven by academic and research-focused content, with significant interaction on LinkedIn and Bluesky. Content related to research announcements and opportunities garners the most attention.

contentThemes.description: Posts related to new research findings, publications, or grants received.
Information about job openings and collaboration opportunities in academic settings.
Content discussing methodologies in disinformation and social media research.

recommendations: Increase frequency of posts related to new research findings and publications as these garner high engagement.
Leverage LinkedIn more for professional networking and to share research insights, given its high engagement rate.

platformInsights.mastodon: Engagement is moderate with research-related content. Opportunity to increase interaction by engaging with followers through discussions.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn shows the highest engagement, particularly with posts about research grants and job openings. It is ideal for professional announcements.
platformInsights.bluesky: Bluesky has a good engagement rate, especially for posts about upcoming conferences and new publications.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
